title: Putting The Band Back Together
itunes:title: Putting The Band Back Together
description:
The cast of The Cigar Authority is slowly getting back together. This weeks show, Barry and Mr. Jonathan are here once more, Chuck is gone so Derek is taking his place again. During the first hour, we will light up the Aging Room Solera and find out what the guys were doing while they were away.

In the second hour, we spark up one of the hottest new cigars on the market, the Pistoff Kristoff. So get ready for all the madness that we call… The Cigar Authority.

 

Next Podcast: The Honeymoon is Over and the Band is Slowly Getting Back Togehter
